title: coralblack
author: coralblack
content: [Have] Payoneer USDT, [Want] USDT I have $1,000 available, TRC20 preferable

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: coralblack on March 21, 2023, 12:07:24 PM[Have] Payoneer USDT, [Want] USDT I have $1,000 available, TRC20 preferablesince you are a newbie, trading can go a little harder here because of the lack of trust in you.I suggest checking BestChange from my signature, you will see the monitoring of a large number of exchangers and you will surely find an exchange pair that interests you. maybe it will help you

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: If someone messages you and wants to take the deal, do it with an escrow so your trade is safe. Choose the escrow from the link below.(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0)It's because you're still a newbie and at the same time, there are scammers around the forum so, this is a step of measure for everyone to be safe with any deals they do inside the forum.

comments.author: Usdt2023
comments.body: I can sell usdt in exchange for payoneer and if I don't have a problem using escrow my price is 18%

comments.body: Quote from: Usdt2023 on March 24, 2023, 01:10:41 AMI can sell usdt in exchange for payoneer and if I don't have a problem using escrow my price is 18%18% is so huge lolMight want to lower that rate if you want the trade to go on.For example, apart from KYC on some platforms, why would someone pay 18% and ignore this much better rates on bestchange exchanger monitor?https://www.bestchange.com/tether-trc20-to-payoneer.html

Do you know which of these exchanges from besteschange require KYC? Any other difference between them?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: March 25, 2023, 09:28:08 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 03:39:31 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: coralblack on March 25, 2023, 04:34:55 PMI have no experience with best exchange. Do you know which of these exchanges from besteschange require KYC? Any other difference between them?Bestchange is that an exchange monitor which displays rates from different exchangers, and you will be able to pick up the rate which is most favorable for you.For example, today, there are even more exchangers on the listAnd the rates are also equally more competitiveMost of the exchanges on the list will definitely require KYC verification if the transaction is suspicious. Please, you can check out each of them if you don't mind. The warnings are usually on the home page or under the Terms of Service.

comments.author: coralblack
comments.body: Thank you, I will explore it
